phrases: We have sealed off all the entrances around the airport.
However, there is still no sign of BK201.
He took a boat and escaped by sea.
No one can escape from our system.
I will notify you when he has landed.
So he used the doll system.
That is what we used to observe you.
Even with that system he is so proud of, he still could not capture BK201.
I thought you would give me a ride!
Filthy abomination... you are driving me crazy...
Nobody is angry in an aquarium.
The mom I knew always used to smile!
Let us go to the aquarium!
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
That they'feel it is good enough
Sore de ii to omoeru tte
if they are if happy today'
But that is also a distant memory
The time that is simply passing by-
Kore kara saki dou naru no darou?
Kumo o koe boku ni todoke
Susumu beki michi o terashite yo
Illuminate the road that I must advance on
Kyou ga donna ni kowaresou de mo
No matter how broken today looks
Both Mom and Shion smiled at that place.
I want to go back to those days.
Keep it a secret... between us.
Synchronization noise in the interior system detected.
The probability of surveillance has fallen drastically.
There are several tiny holes in the network.
There is no way I would find him by blindly looking around...
You will catch a cold if you sleep there.
I heard that you were accompanied by a male doll, but I did not expect it to be him.
He becomes violent very easily, forces me to do some strange training,
and is a good for nothing drunkard.
You are a girl, are not you?
So you thought I was Shion too.
I might not even be Suou.
The area around the aquarium has been off-limits for thirteen years now.
Mom taught me how to fold this.
There is no way I am mistaken.
I remember everything as if it was yesterday.
About my mom and the aquarium...
Maybe it is related to Mikhail Pavlichenko's life and death.
Looks like I have got a lot of things to figure out.
My god... how did this happen?
She is younger than I thought.
Miss, you have some pretty nice ankles.
I appreciate your compliment, but I guess you did not notice this.
Yes, the contrast between your growing belly and slim ankles is mesmerizing.
It would be bad for the child if you were to fall.
Are you in Japan for business?
Then I would suggest you quickly return to your country.
Pretty soon, you will not be able to see the sun here.
And then... a few days later after I left Japan...
Please excuse me for coming here without prior notice.
I would like to ask you some questions regarding Mr. Mikhail Pavlichenko.
Did you just say the Syndicate?
I do not have anything to do with him or the Syndicate!
Do not tell me... that Professor Pavlichenko is a member of the Syndicate?
We are working to stop the Syndicate.
They have been lurking in the darkness.
But we will definitely unveil them!
Please... tell me what happened between you and the Syndicate.
I have met her twice before.
The first time was in Ikebukuro.
when I joined the Syndicate, and went to a university in Moscow as a contractor.
The professor was researching something interesting at that university.
But nobody knew a thing about it.
I was hired as an agent for another faction
That day, I took Shion and Suou to the university.
I just wanted to give my husband his lunch.
When Papa's work is done, I want to give it to him.
At that time, the Syndicate's internal conflicts had reached a point of no return.
Episode 10 You Smile on that Fake Street Corner
The old woman that holds the memories of the future...
The various different futures she recorded...
A dreadful memory written in the Mitaka Documents...
I just want to know about Izanami!
Or else... or else Hazuki-san will...
I thought I was done with you.
You have done your job splendidly.
You brought her to Tokyo, did not you?
A bullet was found in an incident at Oomiya...
as well as an anti-tank rifle, modified for a left-hander.
I wonder how Section 3 is going to treat her.
I searched for Suou after the explosion.
I ran... and ran... and then...
I saw him using the ME on her lifeless body!
What are you doing to our child?!
I am doing this exactly because she is our child!
My body is dog food now!
What are you going to do?!
Shion chose not to come with me.
I cremated Suou's body, and returned to Japan with her ashes.
And today, Suou... no... her fake clone appeared in front of me.
Her downcast look and pale lips...
She was like a perfect clone.
She is a monster, created from his demented mind!
There is no place for me to run.
I was not as shocked as I thought I would be.
Maybe because I am a contractor?
I do not think these things matter.
You should cry if you want to.
But she gave me steamed buns!
Why did you come back for me?
If you were able to kill someone, you would not need my help anymore.
Why do not you be honest and apologize to her?
I cannot shoot people, hence I cannot become a real contractor.
I copied it while I was there.
It is a little bit smaller though.
I wonder if Suou will be happy.
The fabricated memories we gave her.
A day with her family at the aquarium.
She Would be hurt even more if she found out the truth.
She has to learn what pain is.
I wonder what color her pain would be.
The orange glow of a crescent moon.
We can see the river from here.
The river in Sapporo was bigger and flowed faster.
I have a favor to ask.
I want you to call me like back then.
I want you to call out my name.
I do not know of any other Suou.
Whether you are a copy or not,
you are the only Suou I know.
It hurt when you did not believe me.
It was much more painful than when you hit me.
I do not know so many things.
When you called my name, I was so happy.
But I found out that it was to save Yin...
You are a good for nothing, violent drunkard.
Yet, I feel so lonely without you.
Why do I feel like this?
Do not worry about anything for now.
She cries a lot for a contractor, huh?
Is she incomplete, because she is a copy?
She cannot control her feelings properly.
How much do we know about contractors?
But it is precisely because she is incomplete that she is in love with you.
So, why did you come back?
Perhaps I saw myself in her.
We are led by ignorance and incompleteness...
both of us do not have the time to be swayed around.
Do not tell me... that is...
My back is pressed by the darkening glow of dusk
Arukidasu kage ga shimesu hou e
I start walking toward where my shadow points
Taenai ikutsu mo no deai to wakare o
Repeating the many, ceaseless encounters and partings
Kurikaeshi doko e mukau no ka
For all people, while they are lost,
tsumi to iu na no sadame o seotte
they bear the fate known as sin
Sore de mo nao ikiru imi o shiru darou
Nevertheless, I will still learn of the meaning to live, right?
Bokura wa sou Day by Day
That is right, Day by Day,
ashita e tsuzuku michi no tochuu de
we are midway on the road leading to tomorrow
Now Say It Again kimi to futari no mama
Now Say It Again, though it would be great if
irareta nara ii no ni naa...
I could remain together with you...
Within the golden soup is a hidden taste, made out of bitter memories and bittersweet premonitions.
Salty tears flow down and stain our cheeks.
The morning that we split up has come again.
Also known as the Gate of Hell.
If you go there, it is a place where your wish will be fulfilled.
If you go there, it is a place where you will lose something
And so, the curtain for the last act raises.
